Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[ExtendedRadio: 当您进入游戏时禁用电台广告。
Options.OPTION[ExtendedRadio.ExtendedRad: Load the last selected radio at startup
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[ExtendedRadio: Select the last selected radio when you load into a game.
Reload the radios, can maybe update your radio if you made change to it. Can also crash the game.
Reset the settings of the mod to the default one.
Options.WARNING[ExtendedRadio.ExtendedRa: Are you sur you want to reset the settings of ExtendedRadio?
